DOC.brief_summary: Background : No randomised trial conduct , single retrospective study exist compare 3D 2D laparoscopic hysterectomy . In study , operative time hysterectomy significantly low 3D compare 2D conventional laparoscopy . Complication rate similar two group . Thus , although one nine woman hysterectomized although laparoscopy one recommend rout surgery , evidence whether choose 2D laparoscopy , 3D laparoscopy sparse . Objective : To compare pain recurrence usual activity level . Secondary compare complication operation , postoperative complication , time return work , length hospital stay operative time . Design : Investigator-initiated , blind , randomise control trial . Intervention description : Operative procedure follow principle standard whether surgeon 's vision 2D 3D . Trial size Roskilde/Herlev Hospital , Denmark : 200 patient arm study .
DOC.criteria: All patient refer laparoscopic hysterectomy without bilateral salpingectomy bilateral salpingooophorectomy benign indication . Women suitable laparoscopic hysterectomy include : Ultrasound appraisal uterus weight > 1000 gram Need prolapse surgery therefore indication vaginal hysterectomy . Inability give inform consent
